document.full_text: david toms, who lost the players championship in a playoff last week and blew a seven-stroke lead saturday, rallied for a one-shot victory over charlie wi at the colonial.
document.title: roundup: after years of near misses, toms pulls out a victory
lines_and_colors: david toms, who lost the players championship in a playoff last week and blew a seven-stroke lead saturday, rallied for a one-shot victory over charlie wi at the colonial.
